General.Name: China XD Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: China XD Electric Co., Ltd engages in the research, development, design, manufacture, sale, and test of high-voltage power transmission and distribution products in China. The company's products portfolio includes high-voltage switches, such as GIS, GCB, isolating switches, and grounding switches; power and converter transformers; smoothing and shunt reactors; smoothing reactors; DC transmission converter valves; power capacitors; CVT, CT, and PT transformers; electric ceramic products for power stations and composite insulator products; bushings; and zinc oxide arresters. China XD Electric Co., Ltd was founded in 2008 and is based in Xi'an, China. China XD Electric Co., Ltd operates as a subsidiary of China XD Group Corporation.
